title: Find all VPC subnets with a specific tag
description: Using AWS CLI to find all VPC instances of a specific a tag

introBox.headline: How it works
text:
The AWS CLI command can find across multiple regions all instances of AWS VPC Subnet that has a 
specific tag attached
